title: Add changelog management with git-cliff
description:
Add changelog management following the pattern from sift project:

- cliff.toml configuration for conventional commits
- CHANGELOG.md file
- scripts/release.sh for automated releases
- mise task for release
- Integration with jj/git for tagging and pushing releases

The setup should use git-cliff to automatically generate changelog from conventional commit messages.

- Open database
- Add entities/observations/relationships
- Handle errors appropriately

title: Implement change-encryption-key command
description: Add amem change-encryption-key command to allow users to change the encryption key for a database. Interface: amem change-encryption-key --new-key=L9XlJvCKeifThcHz0FQsf. Must re-encrypt the entire database with the new key while preserving all data.
